test.question: You’re really busy at work and a colleague is telling you their life story and personal woes. You:

answers.publicextrovert: Think it’s more important to give them some of your time; work can wait

answers.publicintrovert: Listen, but with only with half an ear

answers.extrovert: Interrupt and explain that you are really busy at the moment

test.question: You’ve been sitting in the doctor’s waiting room for more than 25 minutes. You:

answers.introvert: Look at your watch every two minutes

answers.extrovert: Bubble with inner anger, but keep quiet

answers.publicintrovert: Explain to other equally impatient people in the room that the doctor is always running late

answers.publicextrovert: Complain in a loud voice, while tapping your foot impatiently

test.question: You’re having an animated discussion with a colleague regarding a project that you’re in charge of. You:

answers.extrovert: Think it’s more important to give them some of your time; work can wait

answers.publicintrovert: Listen, but with only with half an ear

answers.publicextrovert: Interrupt and explain that you are really busy at the moment

test.question: You are taking part in a guided tour of a museum. You:

answers.introvert: Are a bit too far towards the back so don’t really hear what the guide is saying

answers.publicintrovert: Make sure that everyone is able to hear properly

answers.publicextrovert: Are right up the front, adding your own comments in a loud voice

test.question: During dinner parties at your home, you have a hard time with people who:

answers.introvert: Ask you to tell a story in front of everyone else

answers.publicextrovert: Always drag the conversation back to themselves

test.question: You crack a joke at work, but nobody seems to have noticed. You:

answers.introvert: Think it’s for the best — it was a lame joke anyway

answers.extrovert: Wait to share it with your friends after work

answers.publicintrovert: Try again a bit later with one of your colleagues

answers.publicextrovert: Keep telling it until they pay attention

test.question: This morning, your agenda seems to be free. You:

answers.introvert: Know that somebody will find a reason to come and bother you

answers.extrovert: Heave a sigh of relief and look forward to a day without stress

answers.publicintrovert: Question your colleagues about a project that’s been worrying you

answers.publicextrovert: Pick up the phone and start filling up your agenda with meetings

test.question: During dinner, the discussion moves to a subject about which you know nothing at all. You:

answers.introvert: Don’t dare show that you don’t know anything about the subject

answers.publicintrovert: Ask lots of questions to learn more about it

test.question: You’re out with a group of friends and there’s a person who’s quite shy and doesn’t talk much. You:

answers.introvert: Notice that they’re alone, but don’t go over to talk with them

answers.extrovert: Go and have a chat with them

answers.publicintrovert: Shoot some friendly smiles in their direction

test.question: At work, somebody asks for your help for the hundredth time. You:

answers.introvert: Give them a hand, as usual

answers.extrovert: Accept — you’re known for being helpful

answers.publicintrovert: Ask them, please, to find somebody else for a change

answers.publicextrovert: Loudly make it known that you’re annoyed

test.question: You’ve been see a movie with your family and the reviews are mixed. You:

answers.introvert: Don’t share your point of view with anyone

answers.extrovert: Didn’t like the film, but keep your views to yourself when asked

answers.publicintrovert: State your point of view with enthusiasm

answers.publicextrovert: Try to bring the others round to your point of view

test.question: A friend arrives late for your meeting. You:

answers.introvert: Say, ‘It’s not a problem,’ even if that’s not what you really think

answers.extrovert: Give them a filthy look and sulk for the rest of the evening

answers.publicintrovert: Tell them, ‘You’re too much! Have you seen the time?’

answers.publicextrovert: Make a scene in front of everyone

test.question: You can’t find your car keys. You:

answers.introvert: Don’t want anyone to find out, so you take the bus instead

answers.extrovert: Panic and search madly without asking anyone for help

answers.publicintrovert: Grumble without telling your family why you’re in a bad mood

answers.publicextrovert: Accuse those around you for misplacing them

test.question: It’s time for your annual appraisal with your boss. You:

answers.introvert: Go with great hesitation as these sessions are torture for you

answers.extrovert: Look forward to hearing what your boss thinks about you and expects from you

answers.publicintrovert: Rehearse ad nauseam the arguments and ideas that you’ve prepared for the meeting

answers.publicextrovert: Go along unprepared as you are confident and like impprovising

test.question: It’s time for your annual appraisal with your boss. You:

answers.introvert: Go with great hesitation as these sessions are torture for you

answers.extrovert: Look forward to hearing what your boss thinks about you and expects from you

answers.publicintrovert: Rehearse ad nauseam the arguments and ideas that you’ve prepared for the meeting

answers.publicextrovert: Go along unprepared as you are confident and like impprovising
